name: Karaoke Revolution
description:
The highly anticipated Karaoke Revolution® returns with an all-new lineup of hot music, new characters, and extravagant venues! You and your friends will enjoy showing off your skills in duet performances or you can play it solo and take your own claim to fame! Rise to the top of the charts and sing your way through 50 new master tracks, plus 16 different customizable venues! Karaoke Revolution is the only karaoke game offering players the opportunity to create and experience their own virtual stages like never before. Can you handle the spotlight?

Features

• 50 All-New Licensed Tracks – Perform your heart out to the latest chart-topping hits and classic favorites
-Features four #1 Jackson 5 hits, plus Michael Jackson’s first #1 solo “Ben”
-Includes popular Spanish songs with artists such as Miranda, RBD, Iskander, and more
•Become the Life of the Party – A perfect videogame to get the party started or for competitive players, sing as a solo artist
-Party Mode : Multiplayer game Modes for up to 16 players
-Career Mode: Showcase your skills and unlock up to 150 new unique challenges and venues
• Elaborate Customizable Venues – Pick your own performance venue before you take the stage
-Ten brand new locations featuring elaborate themes and special effects
-Custom Venue Creator where players can design up to six venues of their own
-Includes an option to feature original music videos onstage during a player’s full performance
• Character Customizations from Head to Toe – Check out the newly improved character customizations with extensive facial features, body morphing, and clothing sets to choose from
